articles.author: Louise McCreesh
articles.title: Line of Duty creator shuts down talk of season 6 filming resuming - digitalspy.com
articles.description: "Nobody knows how this is going to unfold."
articles.content:
Line of Duty creator Jed Mercurio has shut down speculation that series six will shortly resume filming.
The BBC police procedural halted filming on its next run in March this year due to the coronavirus pandemic.
And speakingover the weekend, Jed explained… [+1830 chars]

articles.title: Tributes to 'vibrant' director Lynn Shelton after her death at 54 - BBC News
articles.description: Lynn Shelton died at the age of 54 as a result of a previously unidentified blood disorder.
articles.content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 Lynn Shelton directed episodes of The Morning Show, The Good Place and New Girl
Reese Witherspoon, Alison Brie, Mindy Kaling and Ava DuVernay have paid tribute to director Lynn Shelton, who has died at the age of 54… [+2316 chars]

articles.author: Adam Forrest
articles.title: Piers Morgan says death threats only push him to criticise government further - The Independent
articles.description: Good Morning Britain host say ‘lives depend’ on challenging Downing Street strategy
articles.content:
ITV presenter Piers Morgan has revealed he has received death threats over his criticism of the governments handling of the coronavirus crisis, claiming they will only encourage him to challenge ministers louder and harder.
The Good Morning Britain host said… [+1557 chars]

articles.title: Piers Morgan says Kate Garraway is going through "living hell" - digitalspy.com
articles.description: Derek Draper remains hospitalised in a critical condition.
articles.content:
Good Morning Britainhost Piers Morgan has spoken about Kate Garraway's husband Derek Draper's battle with coronavirus.
Derek was hospitalised at the end of March after being diagnosed with COVID-19, and remains critically ill.

articles.title: Elvis Presley: Graceland RE-OPENING with unique fan opportunity 'It's true' says Priscilla - Express
articles.description: ELVIS PRESLEY home Graceland is set to re-open later this week with a unique fan opportunity, as Priscilla Presley celebrates but asks visitors to be careful.

articles.title: Kate and Prince William will takeover every radio station to send message today - Express
articles.description: KATE, Duchess of Cambridge, and Prince William are set to take over every radio station this morning to share an important message.
